steps: In a pan add oil and fry the diced chicken
In the same pan saute onions ,add ginger garlic paste saute for another 2 minutes.
Add turmeric powder and chilly powder
Add in diced tomatoes and garam masala
In a bowl mix flour,salt,sugar milk, beaten egg and vanilla.
Grease the pan with butter and use a laddle to pour pan cakes
Flip when bubbles appear.
Serve with honey or syrup.
In a bowl mix flour and salt
Add enough water to make a dough and add smashed banana.
On a baking paper spread 2 tbspns of dough with wet hand.
Sprinkle on some sugar or jaggery and shredded coconut
Fold the paper and seal the edges
Steam for 10 minutes
Cook the diced vegetables in a pressure cooker or steamer
In a pan add oil and onions and suate them till they are golden.
Add ginger garlic paste saute for another 2 minutes.
Add turmeric powder,coriander powder and chilly powder
Add in diced tomatoes and garam masala
Add cooked vegetables and salt to taste .
Mix well and let it cool
Cut and fold samosa sheets and fill with vegetable masala
Deep fry in oil or bake for 20 minutes in oven.
